Package com.mygdx.othello.controllers

Class GameController

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.badlogic.gdx.scenes.scene2d.utils.ChangeListener
      • com.mygdx.othello.controllers.AbstractController
        • com.mygdx.othello.controllers.GameController
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    com.badlogic.gdx.InputProcessor, com.badlogic.gdx.scenes.scene2d.EventListener
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    AIGameController
    public class GameController
extends AbstractController
implements com.badlogic.gdx.InputProcessor
    This class manages the game logic while playing as well as all the touch inputs on the screen

      • touchDown

        public boolean touchDown​(int screenX,
                         int screenY,
                         int pointer,
                         int button)
        Description copied from interface: com.badlogic.gdx.InputProcessor
        Called when the screen was touched or a mouse button was pressed. The button parameter will be Input.Buttons.LEFT on iOS.
        Specified by:
        touchDown in interface com.badlogic.gdx.InputProcessor
        Parameters:
        screenX - The x coordinate, origin is in the upper left corner
        screenY - The y coordinate, origin is in the upper left corner
        pointer - the pointer for the event.
        button - the button
        Returns:
        whether the input was processed

      • scrolled

        public boolean scrolled​(int amount)
        Description copied from interface: com.badlogic.gdx.InputProcessor
        Called when the mouse wheel was scrolled. Will not be called on iOS.
        Specified by:
        scrolled in interface com.badlogic.gdx.InputProcessor
        Parameters:
        amount - the scroll amount, -1 or 1 depending on the direction the wheel was scrolled.
        Returns:
        whether the input was processed.
